name: serat
description: SERAT Enterprise Management System - Full Stack Application

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd frontend && npm install
scripts.clean:windows: gradlew.bat clean && cd frontend && rmdir /s /q node_modules build 2>nul || echo Cleanup completed
scripts.clean:unix: ./gradlew clean && cd frontend && rm -rf node_modules build
scripts.test: npm run test:backend && npm run test:frontend
